snippet: Pod1 is being absorbed into the New York office of Group FMG, which specializes in production services with a "low-cost, high turnaround" model that plays up its ability to outsource work to offices in countries like India.
abstract: Pod1 is being absorbed into the New York office of Group FMG, which specializes in production services with a "low-cost, high turnaround" model that plays up its ability to outsource work to offices in countries like India.

headline.main: Creative Digital-Ad Agency in New York Is Being Acquired
